example.content:
RP/0/8/CPU0:c-br-sp-spo-mb-rav-01#show bgp ipv4 all summary Tue Feb 22 13:25:57.759 BRSPO
Address Family: VPNv4 Unicast -----------------------------
BGP router identifier 187.100.0.11, local AS number 10429 BGP generic scan interval 60 secs Non-stop routing is enabled BGP table state: Active Table ID: 0x0 RD version: 2903485008 BGP main routing table version 612950404 BGP NSR Initial initsync version 760535 (Reached) BGP scan interval 60 secs
BGP is operating in STANDALONE mode.
Process RcvTblVer bRIB/RIB LabelVer ImportVer SendTblVer StandbyVer Speaker 612950405 612950359 612950397 612950359 612950359 612950397
Neighbor Spk AS MsgRcvd MsgSent TblVer InQ OutQ Up/Down St/PfxRcd 200.205.253.42 0 10429 1982518713 4827214 612950359 0 0 1w0d 262224 200.205.253.43 0 10429 1996410594 4833747 612950359 0 0 1w0d 262224
Address Family: IPv4 Labeled-unicast ------------------------------------
BGP router identifier 187.100.0.11, local AS number 10429 BGP generic scan interval 60 secs Non-stop routing is enabled BGP table state: Active Table ID: 0xe0000000 RD version: 202 BGP main routing table version 202 BGP NSR Initial initsync version 11 (Reached) BGP scan interval 60 secs
BGP is operating in STANDALONE mode.
Process RcvTblVer bRIB/RIB LabelVer ImportVer SendTblVer StandbyVer Speaker 202 202 202 202 202 202
Address Family: IPv4 Unicast ----------------------------
BGP router identifier 187.100.0.11, local AS number 10429 BGP generic scan interval 60 secs Non-stop routing is enabled BGP table state: Active Table ID: 0xe0000000 RD version: 202 BGP main routing table version 202 BGP NSR Initial initsync version 11 (Reached) BGP scan interval 60 secs
BGP is operating in STANDALONE mode.
Process RcvTblVer bRIB/RIB LabelVer ImportVer SendTblVer StandbyVer Speaker 202 202 202 202 202 202
Some configured eBGP neighbors (under default or non-default vrfs) do not have both inbound and outbound policies configured for IPv4 Unicast address family. These neighbors will default to sending and/or receiving no routes and are marked with '!' in the output below. Use the 'show bgp neighbor <nbr_address>' command for details.
Address Family: IPv4 MDT ------------------------ BGP router identifier 187.100.0.11, local AS number 10429 BGP generic scan interval 60 secs Non-stop routing is enabled BGP table state: Active Table ID: 0xe0000000 RD version: 48524 BGP main routing table version 48524 BGP NSR Initial initsync version 80 (Reached) BGP scan interval 60 secs
BGP is operating in STANDALONE mode. Process RcvTblVer bRIB/RIB LabelVer ImportVer SendTblVer StandbyVer Speaker 48524 48524 48524 48524 48524 48524
Neighbor Spk AS MsgRcvd MsgSent TblVer InQ OutQ Up/Down St/PfxRcd 200.205.253.42 0 10429 1982518719 4827214 48524 0 0 1w0d 806 200.205.253.43 0 10429 1996410596 4833747 48524 0 0 1w0d 805

command.name: IMPORT
command.operation: {if isset($params.object_id)} show bgp ipv4 all summary {/if}
